title: Troika A Communicative Approach to Russian Complete
description:
Troika A Communicative Approach to Russian Language, Life, and Culture

Author: Marita Nummikoski

Scanned PDF, 640 pages, Audio (MP3 128 kbps), Video Interviews for each lesson

Publisher: Wiley

1st edition February 16, 1996

ISBN: 0471309451

This communicative, "natural approach" to introductory Russian emphasizes reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills. Everyday topics are presented to allow readers to begin communicating immediately. Grammar is presented as a necessary tool for communication and is introduced throughout. The book aims at comparing and contrasting cultures, rather than presenting the target culture only.

This is the (almost) Complete Course (Textbook + Audio Files + Video Clips), the previous torrent included only the book http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9569626/Troika_A_Communicative_Approach_to_Russian_Language__Life__and_C
The workbook that accompanies the main textbook is not yet available.
